name: search_tweet
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twitter_pack_v2.
Tool description: Complete pack to get any public information on twitter, includes Twitter Trends, Search Tweet, User Activity
API description: Searches for tweets based on a given query string using the Twitter Pack API.

q.description: The query string to search for in tweets.

cursor.description: The cursor string to paginate through results. Defaults to 'scroll:thGAVUV0VFVBaegLaxgNKXty0WloC2kd7Tl7ctEnEVzId6FYCJehgEVVNFUjUBFQAVAAA='.

count.description: The number of tweets to retrieve. Defaults to 10.
